content: शकलः --लं [शक्-कलक् <ls>Uṇ. 1. 109</ls>] A part, portion, piece, fragment, bit; उपलशकलमेतद्भेदकं गोमयानां <ls>Mu. 3. 15</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 46</ls>, <ls n="R.">5. 73.</ls> --लं {@--1@} Bark. {@--2@} The scales (of a fish).
